items.sentence: Did you expect this kind of thing to happen?
Do you think that Tom will keep his promise?
Tom wanted a violin, so Mary bought him one.
Tom hasn't been paying very close attention.
Tom is paid quite well for the work he does.
We all plan to meet at the bus stop at noon.
Why don't we talk about something different?
Why don't we talk about this again tomorrow?
The ticket is valid until October twentieth.
You don't act like someone who really cares.
That meant that Tom had to act very quickly.
I'm busy now, but I can talk with you later.
I'm not surprised Tom didn't accept the job.
That, of course, was what I was hired to do.
Without his glasses, he's as blind as a bat.
The tree's roots extend deep into the earth.
The evening meal is served between 9 and 12.
Hurry up and you can still catch your train.
You must leave the diagnosis to your doctor.
A nod is as good as a wink to a blind horse.
